title: Indian stocks should give back 30-35% loss in 12-15 months: Rahul Chadha
description: FII money will come back once the virus is tackled, says co-CIO of Mirae Asset Global.
content: It is a 21-day lockdown for India, but are how things in Hong Kong? Stable?Yes. I think things are improving. If you ask us, we started our lockdown late January and things improved a bit towards early mid-March and then we had people returning to Hong Kong. … [+10973 chars]
